articles.title: France Accuses Australia, US Of "Lying" In "Crisis" Over Submarine Row - NDTV
articles.description: France on Saturday accused Australia and the United States of lying in a crisis over a security pact that saw Canberra scrap a contract to buy French submarines in favour of American vessels.
articles.content:
A "serious crisis" was now in progress between the allies, the French Foreign Minister said. (FILE)

articles.title: FDA rejects blanket Pfizer booster shots in major blow for Biden - Sky News Australia
articles.description: The Food and Drug Administration (FDA) will not back a third shot of the Pfizer vaccine for Americans under the age of 65 in a crucial decision which goes against federal booster plans.
articles.content: US President Joe Bidens plans for a third round of COVID-19 booster shots has been thrown into disarray after the FDA voted against blanket Pfizer jabs.The Food and Drug Administration (FDA) will not… [+2161 chars]
